title: Book a Backstage Pass Add-on
description: A customer who bought concert tickets wants to add a backstage meet-and-greet pass.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's concert ticket booking.
Check if the backstage pass add-on is available for this event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that backstage passes are available for purchase.

tasks.description: Sell the backstage pass to the customer, process the payment, and issue an updated ticket/voucher.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sells the add-on and provides the customer with the necessary credentials.
